title: Akali(reworked) is definitely going to be the new Yasuo
body:
And by new Yasuo, I mean:

- 1st times her in Ranked & just feeds a lot.

- Declares he's an "Akali main" simply because he played her only once or twice in Normals, no matter if he did well or not.

- trying to look cool by spamming dashes, despite the fact that they have no fucking clue on what they're doing.

- instalocks her in literally any role. Inb4 "aKaLi SuPpOrT wOrKs, TrUsT mE!"

- starts game, both her & enemy laner met at first sights with minions in-lane, decides to just runs straight towards the enemy laner & spam-AA/abilities on him while ignoring the 99% minion damage.

- "Mastery 7" Akali, which was simply done by feeding every game & boost their mastery points with their pathetic C & D ranks.

- tower dives cz "muh W", and still fails miserably. Still continues doing it even though she failed 10 times.
